name: Lieutenant Grond (V)
Lore: 'Colonel Dyer''s aide. Coordinates scout actions. As a youth, raced swoops on homeworld of Corellia. Formerly served with Emperor''s Demonstration Team.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Adds one battle destiny if with Colonel Dyer or if driving a swoop. May place Lieutenant Grond in Used Pile to cancel a Force drain at a related location.',
